wf_workflow_version.name: Add Portal User Workflow
wf_workflow_version.on_cancel: // This script executes if the workflow is cancelled.// The global variable context_sys_id contains the sys_id of the cancelled workflow context.

sys_variable_value.value: approval=approved^EQ
approval=approved^EQ

wf_activity.name: Send email that request is approved

sys_variable_value.value: // Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to. answer = [current.email, current.requestedBy];
User registration approved
User registration approved

wf_activity.name: Send notification to admin that user creation was unsuccessful

sys_variable_value.value: // Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to.

wf_activity.name: Set request state to "pending approval" and approval to "requested"

sys_variable_value.value: request_state=requested^approval=requested^EQ
request_state=requested^approval=requested^EQ

activity.display_value: Set request state to "pending approval" and approval to "requested"

sys_variable_value.value: request_state=in_process^EQ
request_state=in_process^EQ

wf_activity.name: Set request state to Closed Rejected

sys_variable_value.value: request_state=closed_rejected^state=3^EQ
request_state=closed_rejected^state=3^EQ

activity.display_value: Set request state to Closed Rejected

wf_activity.name: Set Request State to In Progress

sys_variable_value.value: state=2^EQ
state=2^EQ

activity.display_value: Set Request State to In Progress

wf_activity.name: Set State and Request State to Closed

sys_variable_value.value: state=3^request_state=closed_complete^EQ
state=3^request_state=closed_complete^EQ

activity.display_value: Set State and Request State to Closed
